name: Momentum (itch) (A a ron)
description:
Use left click to move, and use right click to shoot

Get 10 levels through killing enemies to unlock the final boss, and beating the final boss allows you to win the game

There is a counter counting how much deaths you have, try not to die too much

Please do not just die repeatedly purely for the sake of getting upgrades - it defeats the purpose

And thanks for playing :)
